name: rginvitational_api
description: API for RG Invitational Web site

scripts.test: npm run unit-test && npm run testParticipantsRoute && npm run testScoresRoute && npm run testRotationEntriesRoute && npm run testRotationSessionRoute
scripts.testRoutes: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/routes/*.js' --timeout 10000 --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=testRoutes --exit
scripts.testParticipantsRoute: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/routes/participants.js' --timeout 30000 --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=testScoresRoute --exit
scripts.testScoresRoute: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/routes/scores.js' --timeout 10000 --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=testScoresRoute --exit
scripts.testRotationEntriesRoute: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/routes/rotationentries.js' --timeout 10000 --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=testRotationEntriesRoute --exit
scripts.testRotationSessionRoute: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/routes/rotationsession.js' --timeout 10000 --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=testRotationSessionRoute --exit
scripts.unit-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha './test/api/models/*.js' --require esm --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=unit-test --exit

author: aborskiy
